mapper.select: SELECT S.SRV_PAC_ITM_ID , S.SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID , S.SRV_PAC_ITM_PRODUCT_ID , S.STK_CODE , S.STK_DESC , S.CODE_NAME , S.SRV_PAC_ITM_RENTAL , S.SRV_PAC_ITM_SVC_FREQ , S.SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID , S.CODE , S.SRV_PAC_ITM_UPD_DT , S.USER_NAME FROM ( SELECT D.SRV_PAC_ITM_ID , D.SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID , D.SRV_PAC_ITM_PRODUCT_ID , D.SRV_PAC_ITM_SVC_FREQ , D.SRV_PAC_ITM_RENTAL , D.SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID , D.SRV_PAC_ITM_UPD_DT , E.STK_CODE , E.STK_DESC , Extent3.CODE_NAME , Extent4.CODE , Extent5.USER_NAME FROM SAL0082D D JOIN SYS0026M E ON ( E.STK_ID = D.SRV_PAC_ITM_PRODUCT_ID ) AND ( 1 = E.STUS_CODE_ID ) JOIN SYS0013M Extent3 ON Extent3.CODE_ID = E.STK_CTGRY_ID JOIN SYS0038M Extent4 ON Extent4.STUS_CODE_ID = D.SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID JOIN SYS0047M Extent5 ON Extent5.USER_ID = D.SRV_PAC_ITM_UPD_USER_ID WHERE ( D.SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID = #{SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID} ) AND ( D.SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID = #{SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID} ) ) S ORDER BY S.STK_DESC ASC

SELECT S.SRV_PAC_ITM_ID , S.SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID , S.SRV_PAC_ITM_PRODUCT_ID , S.STK_CODE , S.STK_DESC , S.CODE_NAME , S.SRV_PAC_ITM_RENTAL , S.SRV_PAC_ITM_SVC_FREQ , S.SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID , S.CODE , S.SRV_PAC_ITM_UPD_DT , S.USER_NAME , S.SRV_PAC_ITM_REM FROM ( SELECT D.SRV_PAC_ITM_ID , D.SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID , D.SRV_PAC_ITM_PRODUCT_ID , D.SRV_PAC_ITM_SVC_FREQ , D.SRV_PAC_ITM_RENTAL , D.SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID , D.SRV_PAC_ITM_UPD_DT , D.SRV_PAC_ITM_REM, E.STK_CODE , E.STK_DESC , Extent3.CODE_NAME , Extent4.CODE , Extent5.USER_NAME FROM SAL0082D D JOIN SYS0026M E ON ( E.STK_ID = D.SRV_PAC_ITM_PRODUCT_ID ) AND ( 1 = E.STUS_CODE_ID ) JOIN SYS0013M Extent3 ON Extent3.CODE_ID = E.STK_CTGRY_ID JOIN SYS0038M Extent4 ON Extent4.STUS_CODE_ID = D.SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID JOIN SYS0047M Extent5 ON Extent5.USER_ID = D.SRV_PAC_ITM_UPD_USER_ID WHERE ( D.SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID = #{SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID} ) AND ( D.SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID = #{SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID} ) ) S ORDER BY S.STK_DESC ASC

SELECT E.SRV_PAC_ITM_ID , E.SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID , E.SRV_PAC_ITM_PRODUCT_ID , S.STK_CODE , S.STK_DESC , M.CODE_NAME , TO_CHAR( E.SRV_PAC_ITM_RENTAL,'FM9999999999990.00') SRV_PAC_ITM_RENTAL , E.SRV_PAC_ITM_SVC_FREQ , E.SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID , Extent4.CODE , E.SRV_PAC_ITM_UPD_DT , U.USER_NAME, A.PAC_TYPE FROM SAL0082D E JOIN SAL0081D A ON E.SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID = A.SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID JOIN SYS0026M S ON ( S.STK_ID = E.SRV_PAC_ITM_PRODUCT_ID ) AND ( 1 = S.STUS_CODE_ID ) JOIN SYS0013M M ON M.CODE_ID = S.STK_CTGRY_ID JOIN SYS0038M Extent4 ON Extent4.STUS_CODE_ID = E.SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID JOIN SYS0047M U ON U.USER_ID = E.SRV_PAC_ITM_UPD_USER_ID WHERE E.SRV_PAC_ITM_ID = #{SRV_PAC_ITM_ID} AND ROWNUM < = 1
mapper.insert: UPDATE SAL0081D SET SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_CODE = #{srvCntrctPacCode}, SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_DESC = #{srvCntrctPacDesc}, SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_DUR = #{srvCntrctPacDur}, SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_STUS_ID = decode(#{code},'ACT',1,'8') , SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_START_DT = decode (INSTR(#{srvCntrctPacStartDt} , '/') ,5 , to_date(#{srvCntrctPacStartDt},'yyyy/mm/dd') ,to_date(#{srvCntrctPacStartDt},'dd/mm/yyyy')) , SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_END_DT = decode (INSTR(#{srvCntrctPacEndDt} , '/') ,5 , to_date(#{srvCntrctPacEndDt},'yyyy/mm/dd') ,to_date(#{srvCntrctPacEndDt},'dd/mm/yyyy') ), PAC_TYPE = #{pacType} , OBLIGT_PRIOD = #{obligtPriod} WHERE SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID = #{srvCntrctPacId}

INSERT INTO SAL0081D ( SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID, SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_CODE, SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_DESC, SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_DUR, SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_STUS_ID, SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_CRT_DT, SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_CRT_USER_ID, SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_START_DT, SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_END_DT, PAC_TYPE, OBLIGT_PRIOD ) VALUES ( #{SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID} , #{SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_CODE}, #{SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_DESC} , #{SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_DUR}, 1 , sysdate, #{updator}, to_date(#{SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_START_DT},'dd/mm/yyyy') , to_date(#{SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_END_DT},'dd/mm/yyyy') , #{pacType}, #{OBLIGT_PRIOD} )

INSERT INTO SAL0082D ( SRV_PAC_ITM_ID, SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID, SRV_PAC_ITM_PRODUCT_ID, SRV_PAC_ITM_SVC_FREQ, SRV_PAC_ITM_RENTAL, SRV_PAC_ITM_PV, SRV_PAC_ITM_REM, SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID, SRV_PAC_ITM_UPD_DT, SRV_PAC_ITM_UPD_USER_ID) VALUES ( SAL0082D_SRV_PAC_ITM_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{srvContractPacID} , #{srvPacItemProductID}, #{srvPacItemServiceFreq} , #{srvPacItemRental} , 0, #{srvPacItemRemark} , #{srvPacItemStatusID} ,sysdate, #{updator} )

UPDATE SAL0082D SET SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID = #{srvContractPacID}, SRV_PAC_ITM_PRODUCT_ID = #{srvPacItemProductID}, SRV_PAC_ITM_SVC_FREQ = #{srvPacItemServiceFreq}, SRV_PAC_ITM_RENTAL = #{srvPacItemRental}, SRV_PAC_ITM_PV = #{srvPacItemPV}, SRV_PAC_ITM_REM = #{srvPacItemRemark}, SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID = #{srvPacItemStatusID}, SRV_PAC_ITM_UPD_DT = SYSDATE, SRV_PAC_ITM_UPD_USER_ID = #{updator} WHERE SRV_PAC_ITM_ID = #{srvPacItemID}
mapper.select: SELECT distinct A.STK_ID CodeId, A.STK_CODE||'-'||A.STK_DESC CodeName, C.CODE_NAME GroupCd , COUNT(CODE_NAME) OVER (PARTITION BY CODE_NAME) overcnt FROM SYS0026M A , SAL0016M B , SYS0013M C WHERE A.STK_ID = B.STK_ID AND A.STK_CTGRY_ID = C.CODE_ID AND A.IS_NCV !=1 AND A.STUS_CODE_ID =1 AND A.STK_TYPE_ID =61 AND B.AMT >0 order by GroupCd , CodeName

SELECT CODE_NAME FROM( SELECT C.CODE_NAME FROM SYS0026M A , SAL0016M B , SYS0013M C WHERE A.STK_ID = B.STK_ID AND A.STK_CTGRY_ID = C.CODE_ID AND A.IS_NCV !=1 AND A.STUS_CODE_ID =1 AND A.STK_TYPE_ID =61 AND B.AMT >0 ORDER BY CODE_NAME ) group by CODE_NAME
mapper.insert: UPDATE SAL0082D SET SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID = #{SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID} , SRV_PAC_ITM_UPD_DT = sysdate WHERE ( SRV_PAC_ITM_ID = #{SRV_PAC_ITM_ID} )
mapper.select: SELECT Extent1.SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID FROM SAL0081D Extent1 WHERE upper(Extent1.SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_CODE) = upper(#{SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_CODE}) AND ROWNUM < = 1

SELECT #{productName} PRODUCT_NAME ,C.SRV_FILTER_ID ,C.SRV_PAC_TYPE ,C.SRV_PAC_ID ,CASE WHEN C.SRV_ITM_STK_ID IS NULL THEN #{srvItmStkId} ELSE C.SRV_ITM_STK_ID END SRV_ITM_STK_ID ,CASE WHEN C.BOM IS NULL THEN A.BOM ELSE C.BOM END BOM ,CASE WHEN C.BOM_COMPNT IS NULL THEN A.BOM_COMPNT ELSE C.BOM_COMPNT END BOM_COMPNT ,CASE WHEN C.BOM_COMPNT_DESC IS NULL THEN B.STK_DESC ELSE C.BOM_COMPNT_DESC END BOM_COMPNT_DESC ,CASE WHEN C.COMPNT_QTY IS NULL THEN A.COMPNT_QTY ELSE C.COMPNT_QTY END COMPNT_QTY ,A.LEAD_TM_OFFSET_N LEAD_TM_OFFSET ,C.LEAD_TM_OFFSET CHANGE_PREIOD FROM LOG0044D A JOIN SYS0026M B ON A.BOM_COMPNT = B.STK_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SAL0203D C ON A.BOM = C.BOM AND A.BOM_COMPNT = C.BOM_COMPNT AND C.SRV_PAC_TYPE = #{srvPacType} AND C.SRV_PAC_ID = #{srvPacId} WHERE A.BOM = (SELECT BOM FROM LOG0043M WHERE MATRL_NO =#{matrlNo} )
AND VALID_FROM_DT <= SYSDATE AND VALID_TO_DT >= SYSDATE
AND B.STK_TYPE_ID = '62' AND B. STUS_CODE_ID = '1'
mapper.update: MERGE INTO SAL0203D A USING (SELECT #{srvFilterId} AS SRV_FILTER_ID , #{srvPacType} AS SRV_PAC_TYPE , #{srvPacId} AS SRV_PAC_ID , #{srvItmStkId} AS SRV_ITM_STK_ID FROM dual)b ON ( A.SRV_FILTER_ID = B.SRV_FILTER_ID AND A.SRV_PAC_TYPE = B.SRV_PAC_TYPE AND A.SRV_PAC_ID = B.SRV_PAC_ID AND A.SRV_ITM_STK_ID = B.SRV_ITM_STK_ID ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.LEAD_TM_OFFSET = #{changePreiod}, A.UPD_DT = SYSDATE, A.UPD_USER_ID = #{userId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( SRV_FILTER_ID ,SRV_PAC_TYPE ,SRV_PAC_ID ,SRV_ITM_STK_ID ,BOM ,BOM_COMPNT ,BOM_COMPNT_DESC ,COMPNT_QTY ,LEAD_TM_OFFSET ,CRT_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,UPD_DT ,UPD_USER_ID ) VALUES ( SAL0203D_SRV_FILTER_ID_SEQ.nextval ,#{srvPacType} ,#{srvPacId} ,#{srvItmStkId} ,#{bom} ,#{bomCompnt} ,#{bomCompntDesc} ,#{compntQty} ,#{changePreiod} ,SYSDATE ,#{userId} ,SYSDATE ,#{userId} )
